sections.title: Feature Stack
sections.subtitle: Our comprehensive toolset for government contracting success

tiles.title: Vendor Profile Builder
tiles.description: Comprehensive solution for licenses, insurances, NAICS codes, and SAM.gov registration

tiles.title: Qualification Gap Tracker
tiles.description: Auto-reminders and concierge filing to ensure compliance

tiles.title: Nationwide RFP Crawler
tiles.description: Covers 50 states and 30,000+ agencies for complete opportunity sourcing

tiles.title: Smart Eligibility Scoring
tiles.description: Intelligent filtering to skip unwinnable bids and focus on viable opportunities

tiles.title: One-Click Proposal Generator
tiles.description: Creates Word/PDF documents with automated e-signature routing

tiles.title: Post-Award Analytics Dashboard
tiles.description: Tracks win factors and ROI for continuous improvement

tiles.title: SOC 2-compliant security
tiles.description: Enterprise-grade protection with role-based access controls

sections.title: FAQs
sections.subtitle: Common questions about getting started with SlingRFP

items.question: Do we need any certifications beforehand?
items.answer: No. We'll identify what's missing (e.g., ISO, WOSB) and guide you through obtaining each one.

items.question: What if we've never sold to government?
items.answer: Perfect. 80% of our clients were brand-new to B2G. We handle education, paperwork, and positioning.

items.question: How is pricing structured?
items.answer: $10K onboarding covers profile creation & first bid cycle, then success-based fees tied to contract value.

items.question: How soon can we bid?
items.answer: Most clients have a qualifying profile ready in 30 days and submit their first proposal within 45.

items.question: Do we keep all data and templates?
items.answer: Yes. You own every document, certificate, and proposal we create.

items.question: What industries do you support?
items.answer: We serve technology, professional services, manufacturing, healthcare—any B2B sector.

items.question: How long until we see results?
items.answer: Clients typically receive their first qualified bid list within 48 hours and submit their first proposal in 1–2 weeks.

items.question: What's included in your pricing?
items.answer: Registration support, proposal writing, submission, and performance analytics; fees based only on awards.
